data.text:
@monchmercader May we know your preferred seats, Monch? May we kindly request you to adjust your account settings so we can send you a DM? 

We recommend deleting your public tweet containing your booking, as this compromises your personal data. Thank you.

data.text: @GPilspab Hi, GG. We're sorry to hear this. We're trying to send you a DM to further look into this but cannot due to your profile settings. May we ask you to change it so we may initiate a message with you.
@DaBoyFunnys Hi, Doubtem. We are sorry to hear this. May we know more details about your concern so we can further assist you?
@akosipaprika May we also know the dimensions and specifications of the item?
@Cruelkosmos Hi! We sent you a DM so we may assist you further on this.
@akosipaprika Hi, DGLurker! May we know your flight route, so we could check with the concerned offices? :)
@VinOronce If you have any further queries about this incident with Accelya and need further assistance on the matter, please feel free to contact us at DPComms@philippineairlines.com.

@VinOronce In fact, Accelya confirmed that it has stopped the spread of the malware and that further security measures will be put in place to prevent a similar incident from happening in their systems.

data.text: @VinOronce Hi, Vin! Accelya has assured us that necessary actions were immediately undertaken in order to contain the incident.
@ajaaron8 Hi, Aaron. We're truly sorry for this unfavorable experience. We have sent you a DM so we may look into this.
@astroboy0069 @PALMabuhayMiles Accelya has a partnership with around 250 airline companies globally. We do not have the specific details of which other airlines. (2/2)

@astroboy0069 @PALMabuhayMiles Hi, Jay. Accelya informed PAL of a cybersecurity incident affecting Accelya internal systems only. 

However, the cybersecurity incident affected several client airlines of Accelya including PAL. (1/2)

data.text: @Momopopohehe Yes, Mari. You may also request for a copy of your Official Receipt from our Receipting Center by sending an email to web_ereceipt@pal.com.ph. Kindly provide your complete booking details. Thank you.
@Momopopohehe May we clarify if you were not able to receive a copy of your e-ticket? A fare breakdown must be shown in the document.
@Momopopohehe May we confirm if you are booked directly with us, Mari?
@Momopopohehe Hi, Mari. This is noted. Apologies for the delay in our response. Should you have any more concerns, just send us a message and we would gladly assist you on this :)

urls.title: Human Remains
urls.description: In some countries like USA, passengers may be required to have the ashes placed in a clear plastic bag (before placing in an Urn) so that the screening personnel will be able to examine this thru the x-ray machine. When transporting ashes out of the Philippines, secure a permit from the Bureau of Quarantine (at the South Harbor, Port Area in Manila; tel. no. 301-9104), prior to the date of departure. Advance arrangement must be made and shipper must provide the following documents: Quarantine Certificate/P

data.text:
@TinBongbong Hi, Tin. Ashes in Urns may be transported as carry-on baggage provided it is accompanied by:

- a Death Certificate (or a true copy thereof)
- a Cremation Certificate

For more info on this, please refer to this link:
https://t.co/VvIv7HcKTZ

urls.title: Fill | myPAL Request Hub
urls.description: Booking requests at your fingertips. The myPAL Request Hub provides passengers with convenient servicing options. Through this secure online form, you can request the following transactions wherever you are: • Rebook due to schedule change, travel restrictions, or cancellations • Convert your Ticket to a Travel Credit • Request for refund • Follow-up on an existing request You can use this online facility in 3 easy steps: 1. Fill out the form 2. Click SUBMIT 3. Receive a confirmation via email Important Reminders: • For more information on your booking change options, visit https://bit.ly/PALPassengerOptions page. • For tickets issued by our partner travel agents, requests on booking changes must be made through your issuing travel agent. • myPAL Request Hub can assist requests for changes to confirmed bookings on Philippine Airlines flights which were made through the PAL Website, PAL Mobile App, PAL Ticket Offices, or PAL’s Reservations Hotline.

data.text:
@widyayoo (2/2) Submit your requests at https://t.co/csrgZrVrNK.
 
Thank you.

@widyayoo (1/2) Hi, Widya. If your flight is affected by involuntary changes, you may request for rebooking, travel credit, and refunding using our enhanced MyPAL Request Hub. Know the status of your request with the new follow-up feature.
@protectheenim Hello! As of the moment, we have Manila-Brisbane flights 4x a week (Mon/Wed/Fri/Sat) and Brisbane-Manila 4x a week (Tue/Thu/Sat/Sun).
@shinjei_art Hello. We're sorry for the inconvenience caused by the flight cancellation. May we know if you have an existing refund request?
@BerryMochi2017 We're sorry to hear this, Nikka. We'll continue communicating with you via DM.

@softandjinki Hi, Clare! For safety reasons, it must be checked in. Please note that the batteries must be removed :) 

Thank you!
@protectheenim Hi! For our flight schedules, we constantly update it. For your guide, you may refer here: https://t.co/F8E7GxwXpD
@9xlvia You're welcome!
@ahvv00 Hi! We are unable to send you a DM. May we suggest to Follow us so we could send you a DM. Thank you.

@SoundsLikeMe4U We're sorry for the inconvenience, Suppatyme. There are times when we need to change our flight schedules for safety or operational reasons or due to the changing government restrictions.
@kimsoakjinn Hi spurples. If it is not a group fare, yes you can rebook the flight of an individual.
@PenGwen06330023 You're welcome. Have a nice day as well!
@PenGwen06330023 Hi Pen. You may replace the Hyphen with a space.
@murkivliem We sent you a DM, Murki. Kindly check.
@briankevs Hi Brian. We sent you a DM. Please check your inbox.

urls.title: Travel during COVID
urls.description: Travel requirements are subject to change at short notice by the issuing government authority. As such, posting of the advisories below is not real-time and serve only as a guide. Please confirm your requirements directly with the offices/websites of your place of origin and destination. All passengers are encouraged to follow the guide, register in advance and pre-book their hotels as necessary to avoid any inconvenience and experience faster processing upon arrival. Per PAL’s Conditions of Carriage,

data.text: @murkivliem Hi Murki! Travel guide varies per destination. You may check the travel rules and requirements here: https://t.co/eTai7nz0LJ.
@dyahleyn We replied to your message, Lein. Thank you.

@9xlvia Hi, 9xlvia. Voluntary changes will depend on the fare rules and restrictions of your ticket. Otherwise, applicable penalties shall apply. Subject to fare difference if applicable. We've tried sending you a DM but your settings do not allow us to do so. Kindly check. Thank you.
@redishapple Hi, Apple. We're truly sorry for the delay. May we confirm if you were able to ask for assistance from the Cabin Crew onboard?

@inoiyaika100473 Yes, Ruben. This will be allowed. Please ensure that your check-in baggage can withstand normal baggage handling. For weight system, you may bring 2-3 bags as long as the total weight is within 30kgs. Kindly note that the dimension of each bag should not exceed 158 cm. Thank you.
@ncthoew Hi, we have responded to your dm. :)
@prolly4u You're welcome!
@prolly4u Hi, Pop's. We're sorry but the 20% Senior Citizen discount is applicable to Regular Domestic Fares only and not applicable to International and Promotional fares. Thank you.

@LoveFromRara We are sorry to hear your disappointment, Mara. We've tried sending you a DM but your settings do not allow us to do so. Kindly adjust your settings on Twitter so we can send you a direct message. Thank you.

@itstheyanna Hi! The minimum connecting time for a domestic to an international flight operating at NAIA Terminal 2 is 1 hour and 30 minutes.
@Bobsie1964 We are sorry to hear this, Bobsiex. Rest assured, we are doing our best to accommodate all passenger requests and concerns. Kindly let us know if you need any assistance. Thank you.
@MagallanesIan @Wheniwasyoug We are sorry to hear this, Ian. We have noted we already replied to you via direct message. Thank you.

@ahvv00 We are sorry to hear this, @ahvv00. We can only reiterate our previous advice regarding the timeframe for refund processing. Rest assured that we are doing our best in processing all of the refund requests. Thank you for your patience.
@Wheniwasyoug @jee0921 We apologize for the inconvenience, @Wheniwasyoug. Allow us to check on this again. We will message you back when we hear from our partner office.
@aimeleficent Hi, Aime. May we clarify the flight route please?
@MagallanesIan We're truly sorry for the delay, Ian. We have already responded to your dm. Kindly check.
@jee0921 We're truly sorry for the delay, Jee. We have already called the attention of  the concerned office and we'll send you a message as soon as we have news.
@rl_oliva We're glad to hear this, RL! Thank you as well :)

@ahvv00 We will continue to work on the refund requests in coordination with concerned units and credit card companies. Rest assured that we are doing our best in processing all of the refund requests.

(3/3)

data.text: @indomanpoweragc Hi, Indonesianmanpower. We have sent you a dm. Kindly check.
@indomanpoweragc You may check with the passenger booked on the ticket regarding the specific travel agency where she booked it.

@shinjei_art @ahvv00 @Skyscanner We hope for your kind understanding that as previously mentioned, if you wish to file for refund, it must initially be coursed through your issuing agency as the booking was made through them.

@ahvv00 If you have already filed for a refund with your travel agent, kindly allow 3 months from the date the refund was filed (or an average of 3 billing cycles) for the amount to be credited back to the account used.

Thank you.

data.text: @ahvv00 @Skyscanner We seek your understanding as for totally unused third-party issued bookings, the issuing travel agency has the control on your booking and in the best position to process your refund request. Please contact your travel agent for further assistance. Thank you.
@shinjei_art Hello, じぇい is Lord of Night @shinjei_art. We are in communication with Ms. Nikka via DM. Our sincerest apologies for the inconvenience this has caused you and your group. 😔

@indomanpoweragc Hi! If you wish to rebook / refund your ticket, you may have it coursed directly through your issuing agent, since the booking was made through them initially. 

Thank you!

@ahvv00 @Skyscanner Hi, 린 엔젤! We're sorry for the changes in schedule, as we do not disrupt flights unless deemed necessary. 

For refund requests, this must be coursed through your issuing agency, since the booking was made initially through them. We hope for your kind understanding.
@BerryMochi2017 Hi, Nikka. We apologize for the inconvenience caused by the flight schedule change. We sent you a DM to further assist you. Please check your inbox. Thank you.
@shinjei_art Hi, じぇい is Lord of Night. We are sorry to hear your disappointment. May we know more details about your experience so we can look into it and assist you further?
